articles.title: WTO: India rejects mere overseeing role for the General Council in reforms
articles.description: The draft outcome text proposes, in square brackets, that either the General Council will oversee the reform work or the council and its subsidiary bodies will conduct the work. Square brackets mean that the text is not yet agreed and consultations are on.
articles.content:
India has opposed a draft outcome that seeks to give only an overseeing role to the General Council in the reform process of the WTO.
